subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Syracuse, a program that has been down and out for many of its 37 years, began the season 13-1 and won a team-record 12 in a row before losing Wednesday night at Pittsburgh.
snippet: Syracuse, a program that has been down and out for many of its 37 years, began the season 13-1 and won a team-record 12 in a row before losing Wednesday night at Pittsburgh.
